"event_1": Phoebe agrees to go out with Roger despite his qualities.
"event_2": Joey orders an egg from the woman, tying into the egg conversation.

"event_1": Phoebe and Monica gather materials for the ritual.
"event_2": Phoebe comments on the effectiveness of the cleansing.
"event_3": Rachel examines the remnants of the bonfire, including boxer shorts, greeting cards, and a charred picture, and comments on the hairiness of a person compared to the Chief.
"event_4": Monica comments on the purity of the grappa.
